title: Hugh Evans (priest)
summary:
Hugh Evans  was Dean of St Asaph from 26 April 1560 until his death on 17 December 1587.Evans was educated at Brasenose College, Oxford. He was appointed a Prebendary of St Paul's Cathedral in 1558. He also held livings at Cwm, Northop, Cerrigydrudion and Henllan.
